title: Elvis (1968 TV program)
summary: Singer PresentsÂ ... Elvis  (commonly referred to as the '68 Comeback Special) is a televised concert of American singer Elvis Presley, aired by NBC on December 3, 1968. It marked Presley's return to live performance after seven years during which his career was centered on the film industry. Presley was unhappy with his distance from musical trends of the time, and the low-quality film productions in which he was involved.
